sections.text: Ancient ruins in the desert are said to whisper secrets to those who listen at dusk.

options.description: Camp at the ruins and listen at dusk.
Explore the ruins by daylight for inscriptions.

sections.text: At dusk the ruins murmur a direction toward a buried doorway.

options.description: Mark the spot and return with tools in the morning.

sections.text: Daylight reveals pictographs that hint at a guardian spirit bound to the doorway.

consequence.text: The spirit blesses you with renewed vigor.

options.description: Respect the binding and leave it undisturbed.

sections.text: You unearth the doorway and a cool breeze flows from below, carrying the scent of rain.
Returning with tools, you find the doorway already open and a single footprint leading inside.
Freeing the spirit reveals a hidden oasis and a guardian who becomes your ally.
You leave the binding intact. The ruins remain a quiet place of mystery for future travelers.
